document.full_text: france's schneider electric sa is serious about buying tyco international ltd, but lenders needed to finance a transaction above $30 billion are skeptical a deal for the u.s. conglomerate can be pulled off.
document.title: schneider serious about bidding for tyco
lines_and_colors: france's schneider electric sa is serious about buying tyco international ltd, but lenders needed to finance a transaction above $30 billion are skeptical a deal for the u.s. conglomerate can be pulled off.
